dict.string: Perfection is terrible; it cannot have children.

Poetry at its best can do you a lot of harm.
How we need another soul to cling to.
I am too pure for you or anyone.
I have the choice of being active and happy or introspectively passive and sad.
How frail the human heart must be - a mirrored pool of thought.
I talk to God but the sky is empty.
If neurotic is wanting two mutually exclusive things at one and the same time, then I'm neurotic as hell.
Is there no way out of the mind?
What I want back is what I was.
Perhaps when we find ourselves wanting everything, it is because we are dangerously close to wanting nothing.

Dying is an art, like everything else.
I shut my eyes and all the world drops dead; I lift my eyes and all is born again.
I am a victim of introspection.

If you expect nothing from anybody, you're never disappointed.

Where an opinion is general, it is usually correct.

We do not look in our great cities for our best morality.
An artist cannot do anything slovenly.
Those who do not complain are never pitied.
Vanity working on a weak head, produces every sort of mischief.

One man's style must not be the rule of another's.
A large income is the best recipe for happiness I ever heard of.
Respect for right conduct is felt by every body.
What is right to be done cannot be done too soon.
Woman is fine for her own satisfaction alone.
I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal.

There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
The best of us must sometimes eat our words.
You lose your individuality a huge amount when you have no money...
I always felt an outsider.
Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
The moment you are old enough to take the wheel, responsibility lies with you.
Humans have a knack for choosing precisely the things that are the worst for them.

The truth. It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and must therefore be treated with great caution.

God is absence. God is the solitude of man.

One lives one's death, one dies one's life.

Words are loaded pistols.
All human actions are equivalent and all are on principle doomed to failure.
Words are more treacherous and powerful than we think.
Generosity is nothing else than a craze to possess.
No finite point has meaning without an infinite reference point.
I exist because I think I cannot keep from thinking.
Every age has its own poetry.
I hate victims who respect their executioners.
A lost battle is a battle one thinks one has lost.

Once you hear the details of victory, it is hard to distinguish it from a defeat.
Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you.
Life begins on the other side of despair.

Everything has been figured out, except how to live.
Every existing thing is born without reason, prolongs itself out of weakness, and dies by chance.

When rich people fight wars with one another, poor people are the ones to die.

Hell is other people.

The belief in magic...is older in Egypt than the belief in God.

The greatest magic is transmuting the passions.
Minima Moralia
Art is magic delivered from the lie of being truth.

Listen, Little Man!

Listen, Little Man!

Listen, Little Man!

Listen, Little Man!
Only you yourself can be your liberator!
Listen, Little Man!

Listen, Little Man!
